page.title: 12BOY'S SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I go to school at 8.45am and school starts at 8.55.We have an assembly and prayers,we go back to the classroom and we do some maths or English.They help you to do sums and talk and write.We have break which is when you stop work and play and talk.Then back to work and we would do some topic work or watch the television.Then it is time for lunch and playtime. Afterwards we might have P.E. or science or a music lesson or a talk then we would have break.After that we might have a quiet reading or sewing or library period which is when you choose a book and you give it back in a week.Then the bell would go and it meant school is over and I would go home.
